import React from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from 'providers/AuthProvider'; import { HomeIcon, ApartmentIcon, EmojiPeopleIcon, WebIcon, // PersonIcon, SettingsApplicationsIcon, ExitToAppIcon, } from 'components/icons'; const BottomNav = ({ user, isAuth }) => { const authService = useAuth(); const getGuestNav = () => ( <> Home Become a Host Login ); const getUserNav = () => ( <> Home Browse {/* Profile */} Manage authService.logout()} > Logout ); return (
{isAuth && user ? getUserNav() : getGuestNav()}
); }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ user: state.authApp.user, isAuth: state.authApp.isAuth, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, null)(BottomNav);
